synopsis.text:
Kino, a young girl with a troubled past, finds solace under the tutelage of an elderly woman named Shishou. Living in the heart of the forest, Kino learns the essential skills for survival, including mastering her trusty motorrad Hermes and becoming a formidable marksman. As she hones her abilities, Kino grapples with the weight of her past and the identity she's adopted from the man who once saved her life.

Haunted by the memory of the real Kino and the guilt of assuming their name, she sets off on a journey to confront her inner turmoil. Along the way, she encounters a traveler who sparks a memory from her past, leading her to question her true self. As Kino embarks on her first adventure, she must face the challenges that lie ahead and ultimately decide who she wants to become.

Based on the seventh book of the series, this movie delves into the origins of Kino's journey, revealing the struggles and growth of a young girl seeking to find her place in the world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
